message.content:
cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper focuses on recognizing hand states and object categories from a wrist-mounted camera system, which involves computer vision and machine learning techniques. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper also discusses the use of deep learning and the collection of a new dataset, which suggests that cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely sub-category. The paper also mentions the potential application of the system in daily life, which relates to cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction). Furthermore, the paper discusses the use of two different camera systems, which may fall under cs.MM (Multimedia) or cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
